SELECT
to_char(o2.ORDDT , 'YYYY-MM-DD') time, sum(d.TOTPRICE) sum
to_char(o2.ORDDT , 'YYYY-MM') time, sum(d.TOTPRICE) sum
to_char(o2.ORDDT , 'YYYY') time, sum(d.TOTPRICE) sum
FROM DETAIL d, ORD o2 WHERE d.ORDNO IN ( SELECT o.ORDNO FROM ORD o WHERE
to_char(o.ORDDT , 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= #{start} AND to_char(o.ORDDT , 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= #{end}
to_char(o.ORDDT , 'YYYY-MM') >= #{start} AND to_char(o.ORDDT , 'YYYY-MM') <= #{end}
to_char(o.ORDDT , 'YYYY') >= #{start} AND to_char(o.ORDDT , 'YYYY') <= #{end}
AND o.STNO IN #{stNo}) AND D.ORDNO = O2.ORDNO
GROUP BY to_char(o2.ORDDT , 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY to_char(o2.ORDDT , 'YYYY-MM-DD')
GROUP BY to_char(o2.ORDDT , 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY to_char(o2.ORDDT , 'YYYY-MM')
GROUP BY to_char(o2.ORDDT , 'YYYY') ORDER BY to_char(o2.ORDDT , 'YYYY')
